turns.content: any youtube video i can share with them?

Certainly! There are plenty of helpful videos on YouTube that demonstrate proper workplace posture and provide tips for staying comfortable while working at a desk. Here are a few videos you could share with your staff:

1. "How to Sit Properly at a Desk to Avoid Back Pain" by the Mayo Clinic: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UfOvNlX9Hh0>
2. "5 Tips for Better Posture at Your Desk" by Harvard Health Publishing: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LT_dFRnmdGs>
3. "Office Ergonomics - Computer Workstation Ergonomics" by Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0TtTXsQsRd8>
4. "10 Easy Ways to Improve Your Posture at Work" by Healthline: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nvVbWYfNn_0>

These videos offer clear demonstrations and practical advice for improving workplace posture and reducing discomfort. Sharing these resources with your staff can help to promote a healthier, more comfortable work environment.
